dev.nokee.platform.jni

Interface JniLibrary

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Variant

    public interface JniLibrary
extends Variant
    Configuration for a specific Java Native Interface (JNI) library variant, defining the dependencies that make up the library plus other settings.
    Since:
    0.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinaryView<Binary> getBinaries()
      Configure the binaries of this variant.
      Property<String> getResourcePath()
      Specifies the resource path where the native components of the JNI library will be located within the JAR.
      SharedLibraryBinary getSharedLibrary()
      Returns the shared library binary built for this variant.
      TargetMachine getTargetMachine()
      Returns the target machine for this variant.
      void sharedLibrary(Action<? super SharedLibraryBinary> action)
      Configure the shared library binary for this variant.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourcePath

        Property<String> getResourcePath()
        Specifies the resource path where the native components of the JNI library will be located within the JAR.
        Returns:
        a property for configuring the resource path, never null.

      • getTargetMachine

        TargetMachine getTargetMachine()
        Returns the target machine for this variant.
        Returns:
        a TargetMachine instance, never null.

      • getSharedLibrary

        SharedLibraryBinary getSharedLibrary()
        Returns the shared library binary built for this variant.
        Returns:
        a SharedLibraryBinary instance, never null.
        Since:
        0.3

      • sharedLibrary

        void sharedLibrary(Action<? super SharedLibraryBinary> action)
        Configure the shared library binary for this variant.
        Parameters:
        action - configuration action for SharedLibraryBinary.
        Since:
        0.3

      • getBinaries

        BinaryView<Binary> getBinaries()
        Configure the binaries of this variant. The view contains only the binaries participating to this variant.
        Returns:
        a BinaryView for configuring each binary, never null.
        Since:
        0.3
